Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=177443 ''Netgear R7000'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] ===See also=== *[[Netgear R7000]] - ''AC1900 Smart WiFi Router'' *[[Netgear R7000P]] - ''AC2300 Smart WiFi Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY316200351 PY316200351] (11/15/2016) 12V/3.5A - 3T3R BCM *[[Netgear R6900P]] - ''AC1900 Smart WiFi Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY316200351 PY316200351] (11/15/2016) 12V/3.5A - 1x USB 3.0 __NOTOC__
